data.name: Peni Parker
data.description: Co-pilot of the SP//dr robot with her friend, a radioactive psychic spider, Peni Parker energizes her allies while granting them Barrier to cover their backs.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, and <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.

For each <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> on this character, apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to each enemy, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, in <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate an additional <color=#86e619>5</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies
On End of Turn, Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn:
 > If this character does not have Barrier, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, generate an additional <color=#86e619>5</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies.

On End of Turn:
 > If this character does not have Barrier, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies.

On Block, by this character or a <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally, clear a random negative effect on that character.
When this character or a <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally gains <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, clear a random negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, lower the Crit Chance and Crit Damage of all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance for each <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> on this character.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies.
